select interact.id as activity_id, interact.name as activity_name, u0.handle_time as handle_time, u0.machine_code as machine_code, goods.id as goods_id, goods.name as goods_name, goods.seller_id as merchant_id, merchant.merchant_name as merchant_name, IFNULL(u7.vistorCount, 0) as vistor, IFNULL(u1.pv, 0) as pv, IFNULL(u2.uv,0) as uv, IFNULL(orderCount, 0) as orders, IFNULL(goodscount, 0) as shipment, shops.shop_name as shop_name, IFNULL(area.province, '') as province, IFNULL(area.city, '') as city, IFNULL(area.district, '') as district, CONCAT( IFNULL(area.circle, '') , ' ', IFNULL(l.name, '') )AS local_name, l.id as local_id, 1 as type, 0 as follow
from (
select activity_id, handle_time, machine_code, goods_code , merchant_code ,goods_name from (
select s.activity_id, date_format(s.handle_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as handle_time, s.machine_code , m.merchant_code as merchant_code, g.code as goods_code ,g.name as goods_name from inno72.inno72_statistic_activity_machine_snapshot s
left join inno72.inno72_interact_goods pg on s.activity_id = pg.interact_id left join inno72.inno72_goods g on g.id = pg.goods_id left join inno72.inno72_shops shop on shop.id = g.shop_id left join inno72.inno72_merchant m on m.id = shop.seller_id where s.activity_type=1 and pg.type=0
and s.handle_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
) as temp group by handle_time, machine_code, merchant_code, goods_code
)u0 left join (
select time, machine_code , merchant_code, goods_code, count(1) as pv from ( select a1.game_user_id, m.merchant_code as merchant_code, a1.goods_code, date_format(a1.login_time, '%Y-%m-%d')as time, a1.machine_code from inno72.inno72_game_user_life a1
left join inno72.inno72_goods g on g.code = a1.goods_code left join inno72.inno72_shops s on s.id = g.shop_id left join inno72.inno72_merchant m on m.id = s.seller_id
where a1.login_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} ) as a group by time,machine_code,merchant_code, goods_code
) u1 on u0.handle_time = u1.time and u0.machine_code = u1.machine_code and u0.merchant_code = u1.merchant_code and u0.goods_code = u1.goods_code
left join (
select time, machine_code , merchant_code, goods_code, count(1) as uv from ( select DISTINCT a1.game_user_id, m.merchant_code as merchant_code, a1.goods_code, date_format(a1.login_time, '%Y-%m-%d')as time, a1.machine_code from inno72.inno72_game_user_life a1
left join inno72.inno72_goods g on g.code = a1.goods_code left join inno72.inno72_shops s on s.id = g.shop_id left join inno72.inno72_merchant m on m.id = s.seller_id
where a1.login_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} ) as a group by time,machine_code,merchant_code, goods_code
) u2 on u1.time = u2.time and u1.machine_code = u2.machine_code and u1.merchant_code = u2.merchant_code and u1.goods_code = u2.goods_code
left join (
select a.time, a.machine_code, a.merchant_code, a.goods_code, count(0) as goodscount from ( select DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as time, m.machine_code, mer.merchant_code, g.code as goods_code from inno72.inno72_order o left join inno72.inno72_order_goods og on o.id = og.order_id left join inno72.inno72_machine m on o.machine_id = m.id left join inno72.inno72_goods g on og.goods_id = g.id left join inno72.inno72_merchant mer on g.seller_id = mer.id where o.goods_status = 1 and o.goods_type = 1
and o.order_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} ) a group by a.time, a.machine_code, a.merchant_code, a.goods_code ) u3
on u1.time = u3.time and u1.machine_code = u3.machine_code and u1.merchant_code = u3.merchant_code and u1.goods_code = u3.goods_code
left join ( select a.time, a.machine_code, a.merchant_code, a.goods_code, count(0) as orderCount from ( select DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as time, m.machine_code, mer.merchant_code, g.code as goods_code from inno72.inno72_order o left join inno72.inno72_order_goods og on o.id = og.order_id left join inno72.inno72_machine m on o.machine_id = m.id left join inno72.inno72_goods g on og.goods_id = g.id left join inno72.inno72_merchant mer on g.seller_id = mer.id where o.goods_type = 1
and o.order_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} ) a group by a.time, a.machine_code, a.merchant_code, a.goods_code) u4 on u1.time = u4.time and u1.machine_code = u4.machine_code and u1.merchant_code = u4.merchant_code and u1.goods_code = u4.goods_code
left join ( select h.machine_code, h.time, sum(h.num) as vistorCount from (select substr(time, 1, 10) as time, machine_code, num from inno72.inno72_machine_info_log_hour where type = 1) h group by h.machine_code, h.time )u7 on u0.handle_time = u7.time and u0.machine_code = u7.machine_code
left join inno72.inno72_machine machine on machine.machine_code = u0.machine_code left join inno72.inno72_locale l on machine.locale_id = l.id left join inno72.inno72_admin_area area on l.area_code = area.code left join inno72.inno72_goods goods on u0.goods_code = goods.code and goods.is_delete != 1 left join inno72.inno72_shops shops on goods.shop_id = shops.id left join inno72.inno72_interact interact on interact.id = u0.activity_id left join inno72.inno72_merchant merchant on merchant.id = goods.seller_id
order by handle_time, machine_code, goods.name;
